title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality, narrated by a young girl in the Deep South.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist, Elizabeth Bennet.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story about the young and mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and his obsession with the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: Moby Dick
author: Herman Melville
description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to seek revenge on Moby Dick, the giant white sperm whale.
